item.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
item.text: Flying, vigilance {T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie is put into a graveyard this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
item.flavorText: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

item.name: Boreal Griffin
item.text: Flying {snow}: Boreal Griffin gains first strike until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: "More than snow falls from the Boreal skies." —Arkin Egilsson, skycaptain

item.name: Cover of Winter
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {snow} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) If a creature would deal combat damage to you and/or one or more creatures you control, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of age counters on Cover of Winter. {snow}: Put an age counter on Cover of Winter.

item.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
item.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

item.name: Field Marshal
item.text: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
item.flavorText: The Knights of Stromgald struck Darien's Roost from two sides. They would have caught Kjeldor in a pincer attack were it not for Darien's tacticians.

item.name: Gelid Shackles
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block and its activated abilities can't be activated. {snow}: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

item.name: Glacial Plating
item.text: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {snow} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 for each age counter on Glacial Plating.

item.name: Jötun Grunt
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Put two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner's library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: Jötun Owl Keeper
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {W} or {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Jötun Owl Keeper is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each age counter on it.

item.name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
item.text: Flying, first strike Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

item.name: Kjeldoran Javelineer
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {T}: Kjeldoran Javelineer deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of age counters on Kjeldoran Javelineer.

item.name: Kjeldoran Outrider
item.text: {W}: Kjeldoran Outrider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I listen to people. He sniffs the wind. And we both sense something big coming. Something very big."

item.name: Kjeldoran War Cry
item.text: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.
item.flavorText: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

item.name: Luminesce
item.text: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.
item.flavorText: "The White Shield is not the burnished metal you lash to your forearm but the conviction that burns in your chest." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Martyr of Sands
item.text: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.
item.flavorText: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

item.name: Ronom Unicorn
item.text: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.
item.flavorText: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

item.name: Squall Drifter
item.text: Flying {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
item.flavorText: "The scouts claim the cold has malice, and a mind. I begin to believe them. Impassable drifts seem to appear before us at every turn." —Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

item.name: Sun's Bounty
item.text: You gain 4 life. Recover {1}{W} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)
item.flavorText: "Heidar has forced the sun into hiding, but it has not forgotten us."

item.name: Sunscour
item.text: You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay Sunscour's mana cost. Destroy all creatures.

item.name: Surging Sentinels
item.text: First strike Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

item.name: Swift Maneuver
item.text: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.

item.name: Ursine Fylgja
item.text: Ursine Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it. Remove a healing counter from Ursine Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ursine Fylgja this turn. {2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Ursine Fylgja.

item.name: Wall of Shards
item.text: Defender, flying Cumulative upkeep—An opponent gains 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: White Shield Crusader
item.text: Protection from black {W}: White Shield Crusader gains flying until end of turn. {W}{W}: White Shield Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Honor your steed and it will carry you to great deeds—and bring you home to tell of them."

item.name: Woolly Razorback
item.text: Woolly Razorback enters the battlefield with three ice counters on it. As long as Woolly Razorback has an ice counter on it, it has defender and any combat damage it would deal is prevented. Whenever Woolly Razorback blocks, remove an ice counter from it.

item.name: Adarkar Windform
item.text: Flying {1}{snow}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: Terisiare has only two kinds of weather: cold and weird.

item.name: Arcum Dagsson
item.text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search his or her library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.
item.flavorText: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

item.name: Balduvian Frostwaker
item.text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
item.flavorText: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

item.name: Commandeer
item.text: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay Commandeer's mana cost. Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)

item.name: Controvert
item.text: Counter target spell. Recover {2}{U}{U} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{U}{U}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

item.name: Counterbalance
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the revealed card.

item.name: Drelnoch
item.text: Whenever Drelnoch becomes blocked, you may draw two cards.
item.flavorText: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander—and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.

item.name: Flashfreeze
item.text: Counter target red or green spell.
item.flavorText: "Nature? Fire? Bah Both are chaotic and difficult to control. Ice is structured, latticed, light as a feather, massive as a glacier. In ice, there is power" —Heidar, Rimewind master

item.name: Frost Raptor
item.text: Flying {snow}{snow}: Frost Raptor gains shroud until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

item.name: Frozen Solid
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
item.flavorText: "Guard, fetch me a mallet." —Heidar, Rimewind master

item.name: Heidar, Rimewind Master
item.text: {2}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.
item.flavorText: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect"

item.name: Jokulmorder
item.text: Trample Jokulmorder enters the battlefield tapped. When Jokulmorder enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice five lands. Jokulmorder doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you play an Island, you may untap Jokulmorder.

item.name: Krovikan Mist
item.text: Flying Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

item.name: Krovikan Whispers
item.text: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {U} or {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) You control enchanted creature. When Krovikan Whispers is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

item.name: Martyr of Frost
item.text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
item.flavorText: "Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Perilous Research
item.text: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.
item.flavorText: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

item.name: Rimefeather Owl
item.text: Flying Rimefeather Owl's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents on the battlefield. {1}{snow}: Put an ice counter on target permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow.

item.name: Rimewind Cryomancer
item.text: {1}, {T}: Counter target activated ability. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
item.flavorText: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."

item.name: Rimewind Taskmage
item.text: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.
item.flavorText: "Find solace in the sun? Burning, blinding, laying secrets bare? No, solace is found under the blanket of cold."

item.name: Ronom Serpent
item.text: Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land. When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent.
item.flavorText: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

item.name: Rune Snag
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.
item.flavorText: "Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Surging Æther
item.text: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

item.name: Survivor of the Unseen
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {T}: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

item.name: Thermal Flux
item.text: Choose one — Target nonsnow permanent becomes snow until end of turn; or target snow permanent isn't snow until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Vexing Sphinx
item.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Vexing Sphinx is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card for each age counter on it.

item.name: Balduvian Fallen
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever Balduvian Fallen's cumulative upkeep is paid, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each {B} or {R} spent this way.

item.name: Chill to the Bone
item.text: Destroy target nonsnow creature.
item.flavorText: "Thick hides and layered armor won't help when I freeze you from the inside out." —Heidar, Rimewind master

item.name: Chilling Shade
item.text: Flying {snow}: Chilling Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: Rimewind necromancers caught travelers in mystical blizzards then trapped their spirits in the mist of their final frozen breaths.

item.name: Deathmark
item.text: Destroy target green or white creature.
item.flavorText: "I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body." —Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

item.name: Disciple of Tevesh Szat
item.text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Disciple of Tevesh Szat: Target creature gets -6/-6 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "You pray to Freyalise, but she cannot hear your pleas. It is Tevesh Szat who will claim your soul."

item.name: Feast of Flesh
item.text: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.
item.flavorText: "Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy." —Garza Zol, plague queen

item.name: Garza's Assassin
item.text: Sacrifice Garza's Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. Recover—Pay half your life, rounded up. (When another creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay half your life, rounded up. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

item.name: Grim Harvest
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Recover {2}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

item.name: Gristle Grinner
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal." —Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

item.name: Gutless Ghoul
item.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone." —Garza Zol, plague queen

item.name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge
item.text: You may cast Haakon, Stromgald Scourge from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else. As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may play Knight cards from your graveyard. When Haakon is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

item.name: Herald of Leshrac
item.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Gain control of a land you don't control. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Herald of Leshrac gets +1/+1 for each land you control but don't own. When Herald of Leshrac leaves the battlefield, each player gains control of each land he or she owns that you control.

item.name: Krovikan Rot
item.text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Recover {1}{B}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

item.name: Krovikan Scoundrel
item.flavorText: The few surviving humans of Krov would have welcomed the return of winter and its sterilizing cold. They often peered northward, hoping that the snow's edge had reached their infested city-tomb.

item.name: Martyr of Bones
item.text: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.
item.flavorText: Puppeteered by Heidar's icy hand, they were sacrificed to the Frost Marsh to raise Haakon's army.

item.name: Phobian Phantasm
item.text: Flying; fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: Phyrexian Etchings
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each age counter on Phyrexian Etchings. When Phyrexian Etchings is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

item.name: Rime Transfusion
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{snow}: This creature can't be blocked this turn except by snow creatures." ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

item.name: Rimebound Dead
item.text: {snow}: Regenerate Rimebound Dead. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: "Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen." —Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon

item.name: Soul Spike
item.text: You may exile two black cards from your hand rather than pay Soul Spike's mana cost. Soul Spike deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

item.name: Stromgald Crusader
item.text: Protection from white {B}: Stromgald Crusader gains flying until end of turn. {B}{B}: Stromgald Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The White-Shielders think their code justifies their actions. In truth it only binds their hands."

item.name: Surging Dementia
item.text: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Target player discards a card.

item.name: Tresserhorn Skyknight
item.text: Flying Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Tresserhorn Skyknight by creatures with first strike.
item.flavorText: Kjeldorans who fled battle were exiled to the wastes. Those who strayed near Tresserhorn were pressed into service in Haakon's army.

item.name: Void Maw
item.text: Trample If another creature would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, exile it instead. Put a card exiled with Void Maw into its owner's graveyard: Void Maw gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.name: Zombie Musher
item.text: Snow landwalk {snow}: Regenerate Zombie Musher. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: The World Spell thawed their icy graves, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But Heidar called them to duty for a twisted cause.

item.name: Balduvian Rage
item.text: Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks." —Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

item.name: Balduvian Warlord
item.text: {T}: Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

item.name: Braid of Fire
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Add {R} to your mana pool. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
item.flavorText: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."

item.name: Cryoclasm
item.text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.
item.flavorText: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

item.name: Earthen Goo
item.text: Trample Cumulative upkeep {R} or {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Earthen Goo gets +1/+1 for each age counter on it.

item.name: Fury of the Horde
item.text: You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay Fury of the Horde's mana cost. Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

item.name: Goblin Furrier
item.text: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.
item.flavorText: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.

item.name: Goblin Rimerunner
item.text: {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {snow}: Goblin Rimerunner gains haste until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

item.name: Greater Stone Spirit
item.text: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying. {2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
item.flavorText: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

item.name: Icefall
item.text: Destroy target artifact or land. Recover {R}{R} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)
item.flavorText: As the Thaw met Terisiare, mountains shed their icy skins, crushing homes and hopes alike.

item.name: Karplusan Minotaur
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Flip a coin. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever you win a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Whenever you lose a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

item.name: Karplusan Wolverine
item.text: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

item.name: Lightning Serpent
item.text: Trample, haste Lightning Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Serpent.
item.flavorText: Ice exploded into steam in its wake, hissing like a thousand serpents hailing their blazing master.

item.name: Lightning Storm
item.text: Lightning Storm deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on it. Discard a land card: Put two charge counters on Lightning Storm. You may choose a new target for it. Any player may activate this ability but only if Lightning Storm is on the stack.

item.name: Lovisa Coldeyes
item.text: Warrior, Berserker, and/or other Barbarian creatures get +2/+2 and have haste.
item.flavorText: "I lead my horde to the northwest. I won't return until the ice wizards fall and their fiendish contraptions are crushed"

item.name: Magmatic Core
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, Magmatic Core deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of age counters on it.

item.name: Martyr of Ashes
item.text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

item.name: Ohran Yeti
item.text: {2}{snow}: Target snow creature gains first strike until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: When a snowdrift shows you its eyes, it's already too late.

item.name: Orcish Bloodpainter
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Orcish Bloodpainter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Blood calls to blood.

item.name: Rimescale Dragon
item.text: Flying {2}{snow}: Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

item.name: Rite of Flame
item.text: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool, then add {R} to your mana pool for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.
item.flavorText: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.

item.name: Skred
item.text: Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control.
item.flavorText: "This close to Rimewind Keep, no avalanche is nature's doing." —Ukoten, centaur chieftain

item.name: Stalking Yeti
item.text: When Stalking Yeti enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to Stalking Yeti. {2}{snow}: Return Stalking Yeti to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

item.name: Surging Flame
item.text: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Surging Flame deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Thermopod
item.text: {snow}: Thermopod gains haste until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Sacrifice a creature: Add {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.

item.name: Allosaurus Rider
item.text: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost. Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

item.name: Arctic Nishoba
item.text: Trample Cumulative upkeep {G} or {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Arctic Nishoba is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each age counter on it.

item.name: Aurochs Herd
item.text: Trample When Aurochs Herd enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever Aurochs Herd attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

item.name: Boreal Centaur
item.text: {snow}: Boreal Centaur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

item.name: Boreal Druid
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

item.name: Brooding Saurian
item.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents he or she owns.
item.flavorText: "I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave." —Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

item.name: Bull Aurochs
item.text: Trample Whenever Bull Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
item.flavorText: The aurochs herd is content to graze—until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.

item.name: Freyalise's Radiance
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Snow permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

item.name: Frostweb Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Frostweb Spider blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on Frostweb Spider at end of combat.
item.flavorText: Its white webs glitter, mimicking the frost on the tree's branches.

item.name: Hibernation's End
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever you pay Hibernation's End's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Hibernation's End and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Into the North
item.text: Search your library for a snow land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: "Our border lands fall under the grip of Heidar's second winter. Go forth and reclaim them for Yavimaya." —Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Karplusan Strider
item.text: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.
item.flavorText: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

item.name: Martyr of Spores
item.text: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Spores: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

item.name: Mystic Melting
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: The sun-hot glow radiated from the druids, leaving scattered metal in steaming pools as it passed.

item.name: Ohran Viper
item.text: Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
item.flavorText: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.

item.name: Panglacial Wurm
item.text: Trample While you're searching your library, you may cast Panglacial Wurm from your library.
item.flavorText: "Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge." —Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

item.name: Resize
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Recover {1}{G} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

item.name: Rimehorn Aurochs
item.text: Trample Whenever Rimehorn Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs. {2}{snow}: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

item.name: Ronom Hulk
item.text: Protection from snow Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: Shape of the Wiitigo
item.text: Enchant creature When Shape of the Wiitigo enters the battlefield, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

item.name: Sheltering Ancient
item.text: Trample Cumulative upkeep—Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature an opponent controls. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: Simian Brawler
item.text: Discard a land card: Simian Brawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "It's odd to see the apes rip down trees to arm themselves in defense of their forests." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

item.name: Sound the Call
item.text: Put a 1/1 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."
item.flavorText: "If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

item.name: Steam Spitter
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {R}: Steam Spitter gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Its belly produces a boiling-hot fluid it can spit as a weapon or spin slowly enough to freeze into a defensive web.

item.name: Surging Might
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

item.name: Blizzard Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one — That player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand; or that player discards a card.

item.name: Deepfire Elemental
item.text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target artifact or creature with converted mana cost X.
item.flavorText: "There are deep, deep places in this world that have long burned hot with little regard for the whitening of the earth's thin skin." —Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper

item.name: Diamond Faerie
item.text: Flying {1}{snow}: Snow creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: "That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right." —Heidar, Rimewind master

item.name: Garza Zol, Plague Queen
item.text: Flying, haste Whenever a creature dealt damage by Garza Zol, Plague Queen this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Garza Zol. Whenever Garza Zol deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

item.name: Juniper Order Ranger
item.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.
item.flavorText: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

item.name: Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
item.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Karplusan legend told of an orc so cruel that he burned his own followers in rage—yet so revered that they rose from their pyres to serve him.

item.name: Tamanoa
item.text: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.
item.flavorText: When Freyalise spoke the World Spell, the tamanoa rose to bring a new morning to Terisiare.

item.name: Vanish into Memory
item.text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to its toughness.
item.flavorText: Out of sight, into mind.

item.name: Wilderness Elemental
item.text: Trample Wilderness Elemental's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.
item.flavorText: "Don't be so quick to reclaim the thawing lands. They might have acquired a taste for freedom." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

item.name: Zur the Enchanter
item.text: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

item.name: Coldsteel Heart
item.text: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped. As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.

item.name: Jester's Scepter
item.text: When Jester's Scepter enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of target player's library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. {2}, {T}, Put a card exiled with Jester's Scepter into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.

item.name: Mishra's Bauble
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Arcum is a babbling fool Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ." —Heidar, Rimewind master

item.name: Phyrexian Ironfoot
item.text: Phyrexian Ironfoot doesn't untap during your untap step. {1}{snow}: Untap Phyrexian Ironfoot. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: It took the Rimewind cultists days to realize they had successfully activated the creature—it just wasn't interested in moving.

item.name: Phyrexian Snowcrusher
item.text: Phyrexian Snowcrusher attacks each turn if able. {1}{snow}: Phyrexian Snowcrusher gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
item.flavorText: Its plow wasn't designed for snow, but to carve a path through shrieking armies.

item.name: Phyrexian Soulgorger
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Sacrifice a creature. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
item.flavorText: The Phyrexian minds that constructed it did not live past its awakening.

item.name: Thrumming Stone
item.text: Spells you cast have ripple 4. (Whenever you cast a spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as the spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

item.name: Arctic Flats
item.text: Arctic Flats enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "A realm once green now ruled by Frost, Where flesh and field both pay its cost. Those dearly loved, forever lost . . ." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

item.name: Boreal Shelf
item.text: Boreal Shelf enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Who will stay the Tyrant's hand, As ice and woe both grip our land? The helpless feel his frozen brand." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

item.name: Dark Depths
item.text: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it. {3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and "This creature is indestructible" named Marit Lage onto the battlefield.

item.name: Frost Marsh
item.text: Frost Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Now caged in Winter's bitter chill, Our people cry, their voices shrill— Eternal cold breaks down their will." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

item.name: Highland Weald
item.text: Highland Weald enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Our noble land, enslaved by Rime, Is it our fate to freeze through time? If this be true, oh wicked crime." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

item.name: Mouth of Ronom
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {4}{snow}, {T}, Sacrifice Mouth of Ronom: Mouth of Ronom deals 4 damage to target creature. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

item.name: Scrying Sheets
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}{snow}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If that card is snow, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({snow} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

item.name: Tresserhorn Sinks
item.text: Tresserhorn Sinks enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Our land oppressed by silent Cold, We weary wretches, young and old, Pray that Springtime loose his hold." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

item.name: Snow-Covered Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Snow-Covered Island
item.text: U

item.name: Snow-Covered Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Snow-Covered Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Snow-Covered Forest
item.text: G
